message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this valuable product for a limited time at the price of $150. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. I'm willing to pay $120 for it.
Thanks for your interest, Bob. I understand your perspective on the price. How about we meet in the middle at $135?
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'm willing to go up to $125, but that's as high as I'm willing to go.
